overview: Agustín (32) returns to the city where he was born, after 6 years of absence, to watch the legal process in which he will be tried for the - supposedly - murder of his father and mother. Alone and in constant alert, he begins to experience acts of violence. Agobiado, he meets an enigmatic and unpredictable young woman who shows him other ways of experiencing isolation.
title: Camino de Campaña
